DataElement.preferredName: Agent CYP2C9 Substrate With Narrow Therapeutic Index Received Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the patient was taking any CYP2C9 substrates with narrow therapeutic indicies.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Agent CYP2C9 Substrate With Narrow Therapeutic Index Received
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._Any substance acted upon by cytochrome P450 2C9._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._A therapeutic index of less than 2-fold difference between the median lethal dose and median effective dose values, or less than 2-fold difference between the minimum toxic concentration and minimum effective concentrations in the blood._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredName: CYP2C9 Substrate With Narrow Therapeutic Index Receive
Property.preferredDefinition: Any substance acted upon by cytochrome P450 2C9.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:A therapeutic index of less than 2-fold difference between the median lethal dose and median effective dose values, or less than 2-fold difference between the minimum toxic concentration and minimum effective concentrations in the blood.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: Any substance acted upon by cytochrome P450 2C9.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.

A therapeutic index of less than 2-fold difference between the median lethal dose and median effective dose values, or less than 2-fold difference between the minimum toxic concentration and minimum effective concentrations in the blood.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for ABTC 1401 study in Rave per request by J.Zhao. mc 2/16/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
